articles.title: Eoin Morgan will know when time is right to step aside: Matthew Mott
articles.description: England's limited overs captain Eoin Morgan has struggled for form and fitness recently but the 35-year-old is a "long way off" the point where he is no longer worth his place in the team, newly-appointed white-ball coach Matthew Mott said.
